content.raw:
I’m going to make a forward port PR for the GUI config tool so the tool can be used to test the ogre2 grid.

Here are some pictures of the grid:

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/zq9ear/images/1897253302-Screenshot_from_2020-03-06_12-49-03.png)
‌

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/zq9ear/images/459907331-Screenshot_from_2020-03-06_12-49-07.png)
~~The grid looks a bit odd due to the~~ `Ogre2DynamicRenderable` ~~class generating shadows, I decided to prioritize the gui config forward port then come back to this issue later as it might be more time than it seems.~~
content.html:
I’m going to make a forward port PR for the GUI config tool so the tool can be used to test the ogre2 grid.

Here are some pictures of the grid:

‌

The grid looks a bit odd due to the Ogre2DynamicRenderable class generating shadows, I decided to prioritize the gui config forward port then come back to this issue later as it might be more time than it seems.
